WebStoreInventorySource.name: WebStoreInventorySource
WebStoreInventorySource.description: Used to configure the inventory source for a webstore.

DoesAllowGuestInventoryLevel.description: Indicates whether guest users can view a product’s inventory levels when guest checkout is disabled.

InventoryCacheTtl.description: Amount of time in seconds before cache expires.

InventoryDimension.description: Specifies which field within inventory levels to use to determine availability.

IsBopisEnabled.description: Indicates whether the location supports buy online, pick up in store.

IsChkInvOnActiveCartEnabled.description: Indicates whether the inventory is checked when a customer adds or edits an item in the active cart.

IsDefault.description: Indicates whether this is the default inventory source value (true) or not (false).

IsEnabled.description: Indicates whether the default inventory source is active.

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed a record related to this record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp for when the current user last viewed this record. If this value is null, this record might only have been referenced (LastReferencedDate) and not viewed.

LocationSourceExtRef.description: The external reference identifier associated with the LocationSourceId.

LocationSourceId.description: The location ID or location group ID for this webstore.

Name.description: The source name for this entity.

ReservationDurationInSeconds.description: The amount of time in seconds that a reservation stays active and doesn’t expire. Required for implementations using Omnichannel Inventory.

ShowGuestInventoryLevel.description: Displays the inventory level to guest users, even when guest checkout is disabled.

WebStoreId.description: The unique store ID related to this inventory source.
